results.title: Ithal Damat = Imported groom
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Huseyin Duman and ACMI
results.brief_description: Huseyin Damat left Turkey for Australia to meet and marry his wife. Although he was sad to leave his family behind, his journey here was an eventful one, especially when he discovered he was on the same flight as Swedish super group ABBA.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Huseyin Duman and ACMI
results.description: Huseyin Damat left Turkey for Australia to meet and marry his wife. Although he was sad to leave his family behind, his journey here was an eventful one, especially when he discovered he was on the same flight as Swedish super group ABBA.

results.title: New life new country
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Fatma Coskun and ACMI
results.brief_description: Fatma Coskun came from a small village amongst the mountains of Corun. However, financial hardships drove her and her husband to Australia to start a new life. Despite a major setback at the beginning of their journey, Fatma and her family consider themselves very fortunate to have settled in Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Fatma Coskun and ACMI

results.title: Yeni hayat = New life
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Kenan Besiroglu and ACMI
results.brief_description: Kenan Besiroglu migrated to Australia with his wife and son in 1970. This is a story of hard work, perseverance and the promise of a new life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Kenan Besiroglu and ACMI

results.title: Margaret living with LAM
results.brief_description: Bernadette Wells recounts her sister Margaret’s battle with a rare lung disease called Lymphangioleimyomatosis (LAM). But mostly she pays tribute to Margaret’s unwavering dedication as a nurse. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria.
results.description: Bernadette Wells recounts her sister Margaret’s battle with a rare lung disease called Lymphangioleimyomatosis (LAM). But mostly she pays tribute to Margaret’s unwavering dedication as a nurse. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria.

results.title: My car : my place
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Bridget Nicholson and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bridget Nicholson’s car represents many things to her. More than a way to get from A to B, her car is a private place, a safe place and has intensified the freedom of travel. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
